HOME.TITLE: PDF Tools
HOME.DESCRIPTION: Transform your PDF documents with our powerful set of tools

COMMON.DRAG_DROP: Choose PDF File or Drag & Drop
COMMON.SECURITY_NOTE: All processing is done locally in your browser. Your files are not uploaded to any server.

TO_EXCEL.TITLE: PDF to Excel Converter
TO_EXCEL.DESCRIPTION: Convert tables from PDF files to Excel format (XLSX) or CSV quickly.

FEATURES.FEATURE4: Process entirely in the browser - no server uploads

TO_EXCEL.SELECT_FILE: Choose PDF File or Drag & Drop
TO_EXCEL.PROCESS_TIME: The process may take a few seconds depending on the complexity of your PDF file

TO_WORD.TITLE: PDF to Word Converter
TO_WORD.DESCRIPTION: Convert PDF documents to editable Word (DOCX) format with high accuracy.

FEATURES.FEATURE1: Preserve text formatting, fonts, and layout
FEATURES.FEATURE4: Process entirely in the browser - no server uploads

TO_WORD.SELECT_FILE: Choose PDF File or Drag & Drop
TO_WORD.PROCESS_TIME: The process may take a few seconds depending on the complexity of your PDF file

API_ERRORS.SERVER_UNAVAILABLE: PDF conversion server is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
API_ERRORS.CONVERSION_ERROR: Error converting file. Please try again.

TO_JPG.TITLE: PDF to JPG Converter
TO_JPG.DESCRIPTION: Convert your PDF pages to high-quality JPG images.

FEATURES.FEATURE1: Convert PDF pages to JPG images

TO_JPG.SELECT_FILE: Choose PDF File or Drag & Drop

FROM_EXCEL.TITLE: Excel to PDF Converter
FROM_EXCEL.DESCRIPTION: This tool supports converting Excel files (xlsx, csv, xls, xlsm, txt) to PDF format. Maximum file size: 50MB.

FEATURES.TITLE: Supported features:
FEATURES.FEATURE1: Preserves Excel formatting: colors, formatted text, borders
FEATURES.FEATURE2: Supports formulas, hyperlinks, and complex formatted text
FEATURES.FEATURE3: Processes Excel files with macros (VBA) and pivot tables
FEATURES.FEATURE4: Automatically adjusts column width based on original data
FEATURES.FEATURE5: Processes multiple sheets in a workbook into separate PDF pages
FEATURES.FEATURE6: Supports various formats: xlsx, csv, xls, xlsm, txt

FROM_EXCEL.SELECT_FILE: Drag and drop Excel file here
FROM_EXCEL.SUPPORTED_FORMATS: Supported formats: XLSX, CSV, XLS, XLSM, TXT

PROGRESS.TITLE: Progress: {{progress}}%
PROGRESS.COMPLETE: Conversion complete! Your PDF has been downloaded.

FROM_EXCEL.NOTE: Note: All processing occurs locally in your browser.
FROM_EXCEL.SECURITY_NOTE: Your files are not uploaded to any server, ensuring data safety and security.

FROM_WORD.TITLE: Word to PDF Converter
FROM_WORD.DESCRIPTION: Convert Word documents (DOCX, DOC, RTF) to PDF format with high accuracy. Maximum file size: 50MB.

FEATURES.TITLE: Supported features:
FEATURES.FEATURE1: Preserves text formatting, fonts, and layout
FEATURES.FEATURE3: Supports table of contents and internal links
FEATURES.FEATURE6: Supports multiple formats: DOCX, DOC, RTF

FROM_WORD.SELECT_FILE: Drag and drop Word file here

PROGRESS.TITLE: Progress: {{progress}}%
PROGRESS.COMPLETE: Conversion complete! Your PDF has been downloaded.

FROM_WORD.NOTE: Note: All processing occurs locally in your browser.
FROM_WORD.SECURITY_NOTE: Your files are not uploaded to any server, ensuring data safety and security.

API_ERRORS.SERVER_UNAVAILABLE: Word conversion server is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
API_ERRORS.CONVERSION_ERROR: Error converting file. Please try again.

SPLIT.TITLE: Split PDF
SPLIT.DESCRIPTION: Split your PDF into multiple files or extract specific pages. Drag and drop pages to reorder them.
SPLIT.SELECT_FILE: Drop your PDF here or click to browse

COMPRESS.TITLE: PDF Compression Tool
COMPRESS.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the size of your PDF files while maintaining quality
COMPRESS.SELECT_FILE: Choose PDF File or Drag & Drop
COMPRESS.REMOVE_METADATA: Remove PDF Metadata (Recommended for smaller size)

MERGE.TITLE: Merge PDF Files
MERGE.DESCRIPTION: Combine multiple PDF files into a single PDF document
MERGE.SELECT_FILES: Drag & drop PDF files here or
MERGE.REORDER_HINT: Drag files to reorder them before merging

TOOL_DESCRIPTIONS.PDF_TO_WORD: Convert PDF to editable Word documents
TOOL_DESCRIPTIONS.PDF_TO_EXCEL: Convert PDF to editable Excel spreadsheets
TOOL_DESCRIPTIONS.WORD_TO_PDF: Convert Word documents to PDF files
TOOL_DESCRIPTIONS.EXCEL_TO_PDF: Convert Excel spreadsheets to PDF documents
TOOL_DESCRIPTIONS.COMPRESS_PDF: Reduce PDF file size without losing quality
TOOL_DESCRIPTIONS.SPLIT_PDF: Extract pages from PDF or save each page as a separate PDF
TOOL_DESCRIPTIONS.MERGE_PDF: Combine multiple PDFs into a single document

IMAGE_CONVERTER.TITLE: Image Format Converter
IMAGE_CONVERTER.DESCRIPTION: Convert between popular image formats like JPG, PNG, and WebP
IMAGE_CONVERTER.SELECT_FILE: Choose Image File or Drag & Drop

COMPRESS_IMAGE.TITLE: Image Compression Tool
COMPRESS_IMAGE.DESCRIPTION: Reduce image file size while maintaining good quality
COMPRESS_IMAGE.SELECT_FILE: Choose Image File or Drag & Drop

CROP_IMAGE.TITLE: Image Cropping Tool
CROP_IMAGE.DESCRIPTION: Crop, rotate, and resize your images
CROP_IMAGE.SELECT_FILE: Choose Image File or Drag & Drop

READ_EXIF.TITLE: Image EXIF Reader
READ_EXIF.DESCRIPTION: Read and display EXIF metadata from image files
READ_EXIF.SELECT_FILE: Choose Image File or Drag & Drop
READ_EXIF.SUPPORTED_FORMATS: Supported formats: JPG, PNG, WebP, TIFF, HEIC
READ_EXIF.NO_EXIF_DATA: No EXIF data found in this image

TOOL_DESCRIPTIONS.IMAGE_CONVERTER: Convert between JPG, PNG, and WEBP image formats
TOOL_DESCRIPTIONS.COMPRESS_IMAGE: Compress images to reduce file size

LOREM_IPSUM.TITLE: Lorem Ipsum Generator
LOREM_IPSUM.DESCRIPTION: Generate placeholder text for layouts, designs, and mockups
LOREM_IPSUM.VIETNAMESE_DESCRIPTION: Generates Vietnamese text using common words and syllable patterns, or uses classic Vietnamese text samples.
LOREM_IPSUM.PATTERN_DESCRIPTION: Generates text using consonant-vowel patterns to create pronounceable words.
LOREM_IPSUM.SYLLABLE_DESCRIPTION: Combines prefixes, roots, and suffixes to create structured words.
LOREM_IPSUM.CLASSIC_DESCRIPTION: Uses the traditional Lorem Ipsum text from the 1500s.

JSON_TO_CSV.TITLE: JSON to CSV Converter
JSON_TO_CSV.DESCRIPTION: Convert JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) data to CSV (Comma-Separated Values) format with custom options
JSON_TO_CSV.SELECT_FILES: Drag & drop JSON file here or click to select

CSV_TO_JSON.TITLE: CSV to JSON Converter
CSV_TO_JSON.DESCRIPTION: Convert CSV (Comma-Separated Values) data to JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) format with custom options
CSV_TO_JSON.SELECT_FILES: Drag & drop CSV file here or click to select
CSV_TO_JSON.INPUT_PLACEHOLDER: Enter your CSV data here (e.g., name,age,email)

NUMERICAL_ANALYSIS.TITLE: Numerical Analysis
NUMERICAL_ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: This tool finds a mathematical expression that represents your birth year (c) using your birth day (a) and birth month (b) with basic operations (+, -, *, /).
NUMERICAL_ANALYSIS.ERROR_DAY_RANGE: Birth day must be between 1 and 31
NUMERICAL_ANALYSIS.ERROR_MONTH_RANGE: Birth month must be between 1 and 12
NUMERICAL_ANALYSIS.ERROR_YEAR_RANGE: Birth year must be between 1900 and 2099

ERROR.COPY_FAILED: Failed to copy text. Please try again.

ACCOUNT.LOGIN_REQUIRED: Please login to view account information
ACCOUNT.FILE_TOO_LARGE: File is too large. Maximum size is 2MB.

PASSWORD.NEW_PASSWORD_LENGTH: Password must be at least 8 characters
PASSWORD.NEW_PASSWORD_PATTERN: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character
PASSWORD.CHANGE_SUCCESS: Password changed successfully. Please login again.

TOOLS_SECTION.TITLE: Our
TOOLS_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Discover our powerful suite of tools designed to make document and image processing effortless
TOOLS_SECTION.PDF_DESCRIPTION: Transform your PDF documents effortlessly with our comprehensive suite of PDF tools. Convert PDFs to Word, Excel, and other formats.
TOOLS_SECTION.IMAGE_DESCRIPTION: Edit, convert, and optimize your images with our powerful tools. Compress images, convert formats, and add professional frames.
TOOLS_SECTION.OTHER_DESCRIPTION: Our collection of utility tools helps with various tasks from password generation to data format conversion and numerical analysis.

WHY_CHOOSE_US.TITLE: Why ToolHub4Week
WHY_CHOOSE_US.SUBTITLE: ToolHub4Week stands out with these key advantages
WHY_CHOOSE_US.REASON1_DESCRIPTION: Process your files in seconds with our optimized conversion engines. Our tools are designed for maximum performance.
WHY_CHOOSE_US.REASON2_DESCRIPTION: Your files are automatically deleted after processing for total privacy. We never store your documents longer than necessary.
WHY_CHOOSE_US.REASON3_DESCRIPTION: Intuitive interface designed for quick file conversions with minimal steps. User-friendly design for everyone.
WHY_CHOOSE_US.REASON4_DESCRIPTION: Access essential tools without any cost, upgrade for premium features. Basic functionality available for free.

FEEDBACK.TITLE: What Users Say
FEEDBACK.SUBTITLE: Discover why thousands of users trust ToolHub4Week for their document and image needs

CTA.TITLE: Ready to Get Started?
CTA.SUBTITLE: Transform your first document in just a few clicks

FOOTER.DESCRIPTION: ToolHub4Week provides a suite of free, high-quality tools for processing PDF documents, images, and more. Our mission is to make document processing accessible to everyone.

HEADER.TITLE: About ToolHub4Week
HEADER.DESCRIPTION: We're building the future of document and media conversion tools - making them accessible, efficient, and user-friendly for everyone.

MISSION.TITLE: Our Mission
MISSION.PARAGRAPH1: At ToolHub4Week, our mission is to democratize access to powerful document processing tools. We believe that everyone should have access to high-quality conversion, editing, and optimization tools without needing specialized software or technical expertise.
MISSION.PARAGRAPH2: By offering a comprehensive suite of browser-based tools, we aim to empower individuals, small businesses, students, and professionals to work more efficiently with their documents and media files.

PRIVACY_SECURITY.TITLE: Privacy & Security
PRIVACY_SECURITY.DESCRIPTION: We prioritize the security of your files and personal information. Files are processed in your browser when possible and deleted from our servers immediately after processing.

SPEED_EFFICIENCY.TITLE: Speed & Efficiency
SPEED_EFFICIENCY.DESCRIPTION: We continuously optimize our tools to ensure fast processing times, making your workflow as efficient as possible.

ACCESSIBILITY.TITLE: Accessibility
ACCESSIBILITY.DESCRIPTION: We're committed to making our tools accessible to everyone, regardless of technical expertise or financial resources.

INNOVATION.TITLE: Innovation
INNOVATION.DESCRIPTION: We continuously improve our existing tools and develop new ones to meet evolving user needs and technological advancements.

TEAM.TITLE: Our Team
TEAM.INTRO: Meet the passionate individuals behind ToolHub4Week who work hard to deliver the best experience for our users.

CTA.TITLE: Join Us On Our Mission
CTA.DESCRIPTION: Start using our tools today and experience the difference.
